summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 13, West Side Heights Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by 37th Ave. Southwest, West Andover Street, 38th Ave. Southwest, Belvidere Ave. and West Charlestown Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 18080 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
